# developerIssue

**Type Property**

The value that indicates a customer canceled the transaction due to an actual or perceived issue within your app.

## Declaration

```swift
static let developerIssue: Transaction.RevocationReason
```

## Revocation reasons

- **other**: The value that indicates a customer canceled the transaction for other reasons.

items.description: The value that indicates a customer canceled the transaction for other reasons.
items.name: other

title: developerIssue
